description: Implementation of SynthSR that generates a synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE from a scan of any contrast and resolution.

input.title: Input
input.description: Image(s) to super-resolve. Can be a path to an image or to a folder.

output.title: Output
output.description: Output(s), i.e., synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE(s). Must be a folder if input is a folder.

ct.title: CT Flag
ct.description: Use this flag for CT scans in Hounsfield scale, it clips intensities to [0,80].

disable_sharpening.title: Disable Sharpening Flag
disable_sharpening.description: Use this flag to disable unsharp masking.

disable_flipping.title: Disable Flipping Flag
disable_flipping.description: Use this flag to disable flipping augmentation at test time.

lowfield.title: Low Field Flag
lowfield.description: Use model for low-field scans (e.g., acquired with Hyperfine's Swoop scanner).

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.

cpu.title: CPU Flag
cpu.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.
